models package¶

models.models module¶

Database Model definition

class models.models.CredentialsModel(*args, **kwds)[source]¶

Bases: google.appengine.ext.ndb.model.Model

credentials¶

App Engine NDB datastore Property for Credentials.

Serves the same purpose as the DB CredentialsProperty, but for NDB models. Since CredentialsProperty stores data as a blob and this inherits from BlobProperty, the data in the datastore will be the same as in the DB case.

Utility property that allows easy storage and retrieval of Credentials and subclasses.

class models.models.Users(*args, **kwds)[source]¶

Bases: google.appengine.ext.ndb.model.Model, flask_login.mixins.UserMixin

User model

email¶

An indexed Property whose value is a text string of limited length.

get_id()[source]¶

Return the id to satisfy Flask-Login’s requirements.

id¶

An indexed Property whose value is a text string of limited length.

is_active()[source]¶

True, as all users are active.

is_anonymous()[source]¶

False, as anonymous users aren’t supported.

is_authenticated()[source]¶

Return True if the user is authenticated.

name¶

An indexed Property whose value is a text string of limited length.

A Property whose value is a Key object.

Optional keyword argument: kind=<kind>, to require that keys assigned to this property always have the indicated kind. May be a string or a Model subclass.

specials_list¶

A Property whose value is a Key object.

Optional keyword argument: kind=<kind>, to require that keys assigned to this property always have the indicated kind. May be a string or a Model subclass.

token¶

An indexed Property whose value is a text string of limited length.
